name: christmas tree coaster mosaic mug rug
notes:
the perfect handmade coaster for your cozy winter drinks – coffee, tea, hot chocolate or mulled wine!
this christmas tree mosaic crochet coaster pattern is beginner friendly and uses only single crochet and double crochet stitches. the design creates a flat, beautiful coaster that’s festive and modern at the same time.

pattern details:

mosaic section: 25 stitches wide × 25 rows high

includes: written instructions + chart

technique: mosaic overlay crochet

skill level: beginner

language: english (us terms)

you can use any yarn with a matching hook size, but make sure to choose contrasting colours so your tree design stands out. try green and cream for a classic christmas look or gold and white for a modern twist!
